Room.Name: Netherworld Lane
Room.ShortDescription: You are traveling along Netherworld Lane, just west of Main Street.
Room.LongDescription: To the east, you can see the intersection with Main Street. Main is one of the longer roads in Oceancrest which runs through most of the western side of town. Netherworld Lane continues east and west from here. On the south, you can see Reynold's Drydock, where Darby Reynolds and his crew construct ships and other sailing vessels. The business is pretty lucrative at this time since ship-building is just starting to take its place in society.
